pma:database.name: microblog
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `messages` ( `message_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `message_txt` varchar(2000) NOT NULL, `user_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `time_stamp` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`message_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=53 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
